function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on travel bans and stay-home orders as primary public health initiatives","Impact":"Delay in implementing more effective and targeted measures to curb disease diffusion","Mitigation":"Implementing additional measures such as testing, contact tracing, and targeted quarantines","Technologies":"Testing technology, contact tracing apps, and data analytics for targeted quarantines","People":"General public, travelers, and communities","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Increasing disease diffusion at small scales due to reliance on mobility restrictions","Impact":"Heightened risk of local outbreaks and continued spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing localized containment measures, increasing testing and surveillance at smaller scales","Technologies":"Geospatial tracking, local surveillance systems, and community health monitoring apps","People":"Communities, local governments, and public health agencies","Owner":"Local governments and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Reliance on global-scale and local-scale interactions for disease diffusion analysis","Impact":"Limited understanding of the true dynamics of disease spread and risk factors","Mitigation":"Incorporating diverse data sources, cross-disciplinary research, and dynamic modeling of disease spread","Technologies":"Big data analytics, spatial modeling, and interdisciplinary collaboration platforms","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, and public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and interdisciplinary teams"}]}
